*div1 type="summary"* *p*Sterling C. Robertson to Austin, June 7, 1831. Asking whether the grant to the Nashville Co. has been transferred to S. M. Williams. Anxious that certain immigrants be not expelled. */p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*San Felipe de Austin */location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="06-07-1831">7th June 1831*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*Dear Sir*/p*
*p*I have just learned that you have arrived I expect your *location_mentioned*house*/location_mentioned* is crowded with those that are wanting to know the news from the *location_mentioned*Interior */location_mentioned*therefore I dont wish to call on you at the early hour.*/p*
*p*I and my friend *person_mentioned*Alexander Thomson*/person_mentioned* has been ordered forthwith *location_mentioned*to the place from whence we came */location_mentioned*and *person_mentioned*all those that we brought with us*/person_mentioned* *person_mentioned*Mr Williams*/person_mentioned* and the *person_mentioned*Alcade of this jurisdiction*/person_mentioned* are ordered to see that we do so. I am anxious to know our fate my own I dont care for although I have spent a fortune in what is called the *location_mentioned*Nashville Colony—*/location_mentioned*but [for] *person_mentioned*esq Thomson */person_mentioned*and the *person_mentioned*unfortunate settlers */person_mentioned*who we have brought with us I have great anxiety. I expect you can give me all the information on the subject and you will please do so. report says our *location_mentioned*colony */location_mentioned*is given to *person_mentioned*Mr Williams*/person_mentioned*, please wright to me on the subject and the fate of our *person_mentioned*settlers */person_mentioned*also the fate of *person_mentioned*Esq Thomson*/person_mentioned*—whether we have to leave the *location_mentioned*country*/location_mentioned* or not*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Sterling C. Robertson*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Colo Stephen F Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
